JoinForm.title: Join NYC Mesh
JoinForm.banner: Join our community network! Fill out the form, and we will reach out over email shortly.

phoneNumber.error: Please enter a valid phone number.

fields.roofAccess: Check this box if you have roof access
fields.reference: How did you hear about us?
fields.ncl: I agree to the <ncl>Network Commons License</ncl>

thankYou.thankYou: You will receive an email from us in the next {slo} with next steps, including how to submit panorama photos.
thankYou.support: If you do not see the email, please check your "Spam" folder, or email <support>support@nycmesh.net</support> for help.

errors.errorTryAgain: Could not submit Join Form. Please try again later, or contact support@nycmesh.net for assistance.
errors.captchaFail: Please complete an additional verification step to confirm your submission
